name: Final Hours (JWRHarding)
description:
This is a prototype that contains basic movement and camera. Stay tuned for updates.

Control
Perspective Control 

W - Up
A - Down
S - Left
D - Right

Duck Control

Up Arrow - Forward
Left  Arrow - Turn Left
Right Arrow - Turn Right
Down Arrow - Backward

Other Control
Left Shift - Run
Right Mouse Button + Mouse- First Person Look Around
